name: Turkey Taco Burgers
description: These taco burgers do not take long to make â€“ double to recipe to make 12 burgers. Set some aside for dinner, then wrap and freeze the rest for future meals. Or pre-cook the whole batch and freeze the leftovers. Easy to reheat frozen patties on the grill or in a frying pan or microwave.
preparation: In a large bowl, combine breadcrumbs with broth; let stand 5 min to absorb.
Crumble in turkey and add seasoning. Using your hands, mix just until combined.
Wet hands to prevent sticking and form mixture into 6 patties.
Heat oil in a frying pan over medium heat. Working in batches, pan-fry patties for approximately 5 min per side, until brown on the outside and cooked through.
Place on bottom halves of buns. Add toppings and top of buns.
tips: Fire up the grill and barbecue your burgers! Grill over medium-high heat, about 5 min per side.
Swap 1 pkg Taco Seasoning for 2 tbsp Taco Seasoning.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 3 tbsp prepared Guacamole dip and 1 cup veggies.

products.name: Nourish Broth Mix
summary: Rich taste of slowly simmered chicken with garden-fresh flavors of onion, celery, and herbs. Just add water!
